summary: A simple mod that makes the Mace of Molag Bal both more useful and correspond better with existing lore than the vanilla Skyrim version.
descriptionHtml:
The Mace of Molag Bal is known throughout the Elder Scrolls games as having vampiric qualities. In Skyrim, however, the mace only has absorb stamina, which is rather useless and damage magic with a soul trap function. I modded the mace to give the exact same amount of absorb health and magicka vs. the standard stamina and damage magicka enchantment. You still need to complete the quest as normal to receive the mace.

Oh and for those of you who do not like using maces due to their speed, there is also a slight speed and lesser weight modification on the mace, let me know if you think it is too fast and I can easily upload a standard speed version and anything in between.
author: Bhurler1

files.name: Mace of Molag Bal Enhanced Old Version
